account_creation.title: Creating Your Influence Account
account_creation.description: Complete account setup process with verification and security configuration

steps.action: Navigate to the Influence login page
steps.details: Access the Influence platform login interface
Select the account creation option from the login page
Provide email address, create password (minimum 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character), enter first and last name
Complete the initial account registration
Check email inbox and click verification link sent by Influence
Enter phone number, receive SMS verification code, and enter the code to verify

steps.action: Set up Two-Factor Authentication (optional but recommended)
steps.details: Configure 2FA using authenticator app or SMS for enhanced security
Add company information and other required profile details

prerequisites: Valid phone number for SMS verification
Access to email account for verification

two_factor_authentication_setup.title: Setting Up Two-Factor Authentication

steps.details: Navigate to account settings and locate security options
Select 2FA option from security settings
Select between authenticator app or SMS-based verification
Set up authenticator app by scanning QR code or configure SMS number
Enter verification code to confirm 2FA is working correctly
Store backup recovery codes in a secure location

prerequisites: Authenticator app installed (if using app method)
Access to phone number (if using SMS method)

campaign_creation.title: Creating a New Campaign
campaign_creation.description: Complete process for creating and setting up a new influencer campaign

steps.details: Access the main campaigns dashboard from the navigation menu
Select the new campaign creation option
Provide campaign name, description, and campaign type selection
Define start date, end date, and overall campaign budget parameters
Specify required content types, posting schedules, and performance targets
Define payment terms, rates, and compensation model (flat fee, commission, etc.)
Upload brand guidelines, content requirements, and campaign messaging
Validate all campaign settings and create the campaign

prerequisites: Active Influence account with campaign creation permissions
source_documents: /Users/ashutoshbijoor/Documents/Accion Labs/Projects/Cision/Nexus/Brandwatch/brandwatch-docs-viewer/docs/pdfs/Influence/Influence/Using Influence/Creating Campaigns/Campaign Creation, Proposal, and Reporting.pdf

adding_influencers_to_campaign.title: Adding Influencers to Campaign
adding_influencers_to_campaign.description: Process for selecting and adding influencers to an existing campaign

steps.details: Navigate to the specific campaign where influencers will be added
Use the 'Add Influencers' function within the campaign
Apply filters for demographics, follower count, engagement rates, niche, and location
Examine influencer statistics, previous work, and alignment with campaign goals
Choose influencers that match campaign requirements and add them to the campaign
Define specific payment amounts or rates for each selected influencer
Specify content requirements, deadlines, and approval processes for each influencer
Notify selected influencers about the campaign opportunity

source_documents: /Users/ashutoshbijoor/Documents/Accion Labs/Projects/Cision/Nexus/Brandwatch/brandwatch-docs-viewer/docs/pdfs/Influence/Influence/Using Influence/Creating Campaigns/Campaign Creation, Proposal, and Reporting.pdf

/Users/ashutoshbijoor/Documents/Accion Labs/Projects/Cision/Nexus/Brandwatch/brandwatch-docs-viewer/docs/pdfs/Influence/Influence/Using Influence/Creating Campaigns/Managing Campaigns and Exporting Data.pdf

campaign_proposal_process.title: Campaign Proposal and Approval Process
campaign_proposal_process.description: Workflow for managing influencer proposals and campaign approvals

steps.details: Check proposals submitted by influencers in response to campaign invitations
Assess proposed content ideas, timelines, and deliverables against campaign requirements
Discuss modifications to compensation, deliverables, or timelines with influencers
Make final decision on each proposal and communicate status to influencers
Generate and distribute legal agreements for approved campaign participation
Track contract completion status and follow up with influencers as needed
Begin the onboarding process for influencers with signed contracts

source_documents: /Users/ashutoshbijoor/Documents/Accion Labs/Projects/Cision/Nexus/Brandwatch/brandwatch-docs-viewer/docs/pdfs/Influence/Influence/Using Influence/Creating Campaigns/Campaign Creation, Proposal, and Reporting.pdf

campaign_onboarding_state_management.title: Managing Campaign Onboarding States
campaign_onboarding_state_management.description: Process for tracking and managing influencer onboarding progress through various states

steps.details: Access the campaign dashboard showing all influencers and their current onboarding states
Monitor influencers who have been invited but haven't yet responded to campaign
Review and respond to influencers who have submitted applications or proposals
Send contracts and onboarding materials to approved influencers
Monitor contract signing progress and send reminders if needed
Begin content creation phase for influencers who have completed onboarding
Manually update influencer states based on progress or issues encountered

source_documents: /Users/ashutoshbijoor/Documents/Accion Labs/Projects/Cision/Nexus/Brandwatch/brandwatch-docs-viewer/docs/pdfs/Influence/Influence/Using Influence/Creating Campaigns/Campaign Creation, Proposal, and Reporting.pdf

campaign_reporting.title: Campaign Performance Reporting
campaign_reporting.description: Process for generating and analyzing campaign performance reports

steps.details: Navigate to the reporting section for the specific campaign
Define the date range for the performance report
Select key performance indicators such as reach, engagement, conversions, and ROI
Create comprehensive report showing campaign results and influencer performance
Review detailed metrics for each participating influencer
Evaluate actual performance versus original campaign objectives and KPIs
Download report in desired format or share with stakeholders
Record key learnings and recommendations for future campaigns

source_documents: /Users/ashutoshbijoor/Documents/Accion Labs/Projects/Cision/Nexus/Brandwatch/brandwatch-docs-viewer/docs/pdfs/Influence/Influence/Using Influence/Creating Campaigns/Campaign Creation, Proposal, and Reporting.pdf

editing_influencer_profiles_in_campaign.title: Editing Influencer Profiles Within Campaign
editing_influencer_profiles_in_campaign.description: Process for modifying influencer information and settings within a specific campaign

steps.details: Navigate to the specific campaign containing the influencer to be edited
Find the specific influencer in the campaign participant list
Click on influencer profile or edit icon to open modification interface
Update compensation rates, deliverable requirements, or campaign-specific notes
Update email address, phone number, or other contact details as required
Modify content requirements, posting schedules, or approval workflows
Confirm and save all modifications to the influencer's campaign profile
Send communication about any changes that affect the influencer's responsibilities

source_documents: /Users/ashutoshbijoor/Documents/Accion Labs/Projects/Cision/Nexus/Brandwatch/brandwatch-docs-viewer/docs/pdfs/Influence/Influence/Using Influence/Creating Campaigns/Managing Campaigns and Exporting Data.pdf

managing_influencer_rates.title: Managing Influencer Compensation Rates
managing_influencer_rates.description: Process for setting and updating influencer payment rates within campaigns

steps.details: Navigate to the compensation or rates section within the campaign
Examine existing payment rates for all campaign participants
Choose specific influencer whose compensation needs adjustment
Modify the primary compensation amount for standard deliverables
Configure additional compensation for performance milestones or bonus content
Specify payment schedule, currency, and payment method preferences
Save and activate the new compensation structure
Generate amended contracts reflecting the new compensation terms

source_documents: /Users/ashutoshbijoor/Documents/Accion Labs/Projects/Cision/Nexus/Brandwatch/brandwatch-docs-viewer/docs/pdfs/Influence/Influence/Using Influence/Creating Campaigns/Managing Campaigns and Exporting Data.pdf

data_export_process.title: Exporting Campaign and Influencer Data
data_export_process.description: Process for exporting campaign performance data and influencer information

steps.details: Access the export functionality from campaign or reports menu
Choose whether to export campaign data, influencer data, or performance metrics
Specify the time period for data to be included in the export
Select specific metrics, demographics, or performance indicators to include
Choose file format such as CSV, Excel, or PDF for the exported data
Filter data by influencer segments, campaign types, or performance thresholds
Process the data export request and create the downloadable file
Download the exported file and verify data accuracy and completeness

source_documents: /Users/ashutoshbijoor/Documents/Accion Labs/Projects/Cision/Nexus/Brandwatch/brandwatch-docs-viewer/docs/pdfs/Influence/Influence/Using Influence/Creating Campaigns/Managing Campaigns and Exporting Data.pdf

influencer_profile_management.title: Managing Influencer Profiles
influencer_profile_management.description: Complete process for creating, editing, and maintaining influencer profiles in the CRM

steps.details: Navigate to the main influencer management dashboard

steps.action: Create new influencer profile or select existing
steps.details: Either add a new influencer or select an existing profile to edit
Add name, email, phone number, and primary social media handles
Connect and verify Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and other relevant social platforms
Record age, location, gender, and other relevant demographic data
Input follower counts, engagement rates, and audience demographics
Tag influencer with relevant industry niches and content categories
Include internal notes, collaboration history, and custom tags for organization
Complete profile creation and make it available for campaign inclusion

influencer_search_and_filtering.title: Searching and Filtering Influencers
influencer_search_and_filtering.description: Process for finding influencers using search and filter capabilities

steps.details: Navigate to the main influencer management section
Enter keywords, names, or handles in the main search bar
Filter by age range, gender, location, and other demographic criteria
Define minimum and maximum follower counts across different platforms
Set thresholds for engagement rates, average likes, and interaction quality
Select specific industries, content types, or interest categories
Filter by custom tags, collaboration history, or internal classifications
Order results by relevance, engagement, or other criteria and review matches
Save frequently used filter combinations for future searches

bulk_influencer_actions.title: Performing Bulk Actions on Influencers
bulk_influencer_actions.description: Process for executing actions on multiple influencers simultaneously

steps.details: Navigate to the influencer management section with list display
Use checkboxes or selection tools to choose multiple influencer profiles
Select from available actions such as tagging, messaging, campaign addition, or status updates
Set specific details for the chosen action (tags to add, message content, campaign to join)
Review which influencers will be affected and what changes will be made
Confirm and run the bulk operation on all selected influencers
Track the completion status of the bulk operation
Check that the bulk action was completed successfully for all selected influencers

influencer_tagging_system.title: Managing Influencer Tags and Categories
influencer_tagging_system.description: Process for creating and managing tag systems for influencer organization

steps.details: Navigate to the tagging or categorization section of influencer management
Define new tag types such as performance levels, niches, or collaboration status
Create specific tags within categories (e.g., 'High Performer', 'Beauty Niche', 'VIP')
Select influencers and assign relevant tags for organization and filtering
Customize visual appearance of tags for easy identification
Establish parent-child relationships between related tags
Control which team members can create, edit, or apply specific tags
Review tag distribution and effectiveness for influencer organization

influencer_onboarding_process.title: Complete Influencer Onboarding Process
influencer_onboarding_process.description: End-to-end process for onboarding influencers from application to campaign readiness

steps.details: Process incoming applications from influencers interested in joining campaigns
Evaluate influencer profile, social media metrics, and alignment with brand requirements
Make decision on influencer acceptance based on evaluation criteria
Invite approved influencers to complete the onboarding process
Assist influencers in completing their detailed profiles and verification
Provide contracts and guide influencers through the legal agreement process
Help influencers configure payment details and tax information through Tipalti
Verify social media accounts, identity, and other required documentation
Offer training on platform features, campaign processes, and best practices
Mark influencer as fully onboarded and available for campaign participation

contract_management.title: Managing Influencer Contracts
contract_management.description: Process for creating, sending, and managing legal agreements with influencers

steps.details: Navigate to the contracts section within influencer management
Choose appropriate contract template based on influencer type and campaign requirements
Modify standard terms to include specific deliverables, compensation, and campaign details
Insert influencer name, contact details, and personalized contract elements
Verify all terms, compensation amounts, and legal clauses are correct
Distribute contract via email or platform messaging for influencer review and signature
Track contract status and send reminders if needed for completion
Archive completed contracts in the system for future reference and compliance
Configure alerts for contract expiration and renewal requirements

payment_processing.title: Sending Payments to Influencers
payment_processing.description: Complete process for processing and sending payments to influencers via Tipalti

steps.details: Navigate to the payments section of the Influence platform
Choose influencers who have completed deliverables and are ready for payment
Confirm payment amounts based on completed work and agreed compensation rates
Check recipient information, payment method, and currency settings
Include reference information or campaign details for payment tracking
Send payment requests to Tipalti payment processing system
Track payment processing progress through Tipalti integration
Verify payments have been successfully sent to influencers
Record payment completion in influencer profiles and campaign tracking

payment_system_configuration.title: Configuring Tipalti Payment System
payment_system_configuration.description: Process for setting up and configuring the Tipalti payment integration

steps.details: Navigate to the payment system configuration section in admin settings
Input Tipalti account API keys and authentication credentials
Set up available payment options such as bank transfer, PayPal, and other methods
Define primary currency and configure multi-currency support if needed
Set up payment approval processes and authorization levels
Configure automatic payment schedules and batch processing settings
Perform test transactions to verify Tipalti integration is working correctly
Set up email notifications for payment status updates and confirmations
Enable the payment system for production use with influencers

payment_invitation_process.title: Inviting Influencers to Set Up Payment Details
payment_invitation_process.description: Process for inviting influencers to configure their payment information through Tipalti

steps.details: Navigate to the payment setup section for influencer management
Choose influencers who need to complete their payment configuration
Create personalized invitations with Tipalti onboarding links
Add personalized content explaining the payment setup process
Distribute payment setup invitations via email or platform messaging
Track which influencers have completed their payment configuration
Follow up with influencers who haven't completed payment setup
Confirm that payment details have been properly configured in Tipalti
Mark influencers as payment-ready in the system once setup is complete

source_documents: /Users/ashutoshbijoor/Documents/Accion Labs/Projects/Cision/Nexus/Brandwatch/brandwatch-docs-viewer/docs/pdfs/Influence/Influence/Using Influence/Paying Influencers/Inviting Influencers to Receive Payments.pdf

payment_history_tracking.title: Tracking Payment History and Status
payment_history_tracking.description: Process for monitoring and managing payment history and transaction status

steps.details: Navigate to the payment tracking and history section
Apply filters by date range, influencer, campaign, or payment status
Examine specific payment transactions for amounts, dates, and status
Monitor payments through various stages: pending, processing, completed, failed
Research and resolve any failed or delayed payment transactions
Create reports showing payment summaries, trends, and financial data
Download payment records for accounting, tax purposes, or external analysis
Match payment records with banking statements and accounting systems

bulk_messaging_to_influencers.title: Sending Bulk Messages to Influencers
bulk_messaging_to_influencers.description: Process for creating and sending bulk email messages to multiple influencers

steps.details: Navigate to the messaging or communication section of the platform
Choose the bulk messaging feature for sending to multiple recipients
Select influencers by campaign, tags, filters, or manual selection
Choose from existing templates or create a new message template
Edit subject line, body content, and personalization elements
Insert personalization tokens like influencer name, campaign details, or custom fields
Review how the message will appear for different influencers
Choose to send now or schedule for later delivery
Track email delivery rates, opens, and responses

message_template_management.title: Managing Message Templates
message_template_management.description: Process for creating and managing reusable email templates for influencer communication

steps.details: Navigate to the message templates area within communication settings
Start creating a new email template or select existing template to edit
Specify template category such as campaign invitations, onboarding, or follow-ups
Create email structure with header, body sections, and footer elements
Insert merge fields for personalization like {{influencer_name}}, {{campaign_name}}
Apply branding, colors, fonts, and visual elements to match company style
Preview template with sample data to ensure proper formatting and personalization
Store template with descriptive name and organize into appropriate categories
Control which team members can use, edit, or delete the template

message_tracking_and_analytics.title: Tracking Message Performance and Analytics
message_tracking_and_analytics.description: Process for monitoring email delivery, engagement, and response metrics

steps.details: Navigate to the messaging analytics and reporting section
Choose specific bulk message or template to review performance
Check delivery rates, bounce rates, and delivery failures
Examine open rates, click-through rates, and time-based engagement patterns
Monitor reply rates and response quality from influencers
Determine which message templates and content types generate best results
Create reports showing messaging effectiveness and ROI metrics
Use analytics insights to improve subject lines, content, and send timing

social_account_authentication.title: Authenticating Social Media Accounts
social_account_authentication.description: Process for connecting and verifying influencer social media accounts

steps.details: Navigate to the social media authentication section in influencer profile
Choose from available platforms: Instagram Business/Creator, Facebook Page, TikTok, YouTube
Click connect button to start OAuth flow with selected social platform
Authorize Influence platform to access account data and posting capabilities
Choose which accounts to connect if multiple accounts are available
Complete verification process to confirm account ownership and authenticity
Set up automatic syncing of metrics, posts, and audience data
Verify that data is flowing correctly and posting capabilities work
Complete setup and activate social media integration

prerequisites: Accounts meet platform requirements (e.g., Instagram Business/Creator account)
source_documents: /Users/ashutoshbijoor/Documents/Accion Labs/Projects/Cision/Nexus/Brandwatch/brandwatch-docs-viewer/docs/pdfs/Influence/Influence/Using Influence/Managing Influencers/Authenticating Social Accounts in Influence.pdf

instagram_business_account_setup.title: Setting Up Instagram Business/Creator Account
instagram_business_account_setup.description: Specific process for connecting Instagram Business or Creator accounts

steps.details: Ensure Instagram account is set to Business or Creator account type
Link Instagram account to associated Facebook Page for Business accounts
Begin OAuth flow for Instagram Business/Creator account connection
Authorize access to Instagram Insights, posting, and profile data
Choose specific Instagram Business/Creator account to connect
Confirm that Instagram Insights data is accessible through the connection
Verify ability to post content through the Influence platform
Ensure Instagram account shows as successfully connected and active

source_documents: /Users/ashutoshbijoor/Documents/Accion Labs/Projects/Cision/Nexus/Brandwatch/brandwatch-docs-viewer/docs/pdfs/Influence/Influence/Using Influence/Managing Influencers/Authenticating Social Accounts in Influence.pdf

facebook_page_connection.title: Connecting Facebook Pages
facebook_page_connection.description: Process for connecting Facebook Pages for content management and analytics

steps.details: Navigate to Facebook connection options in social media settings
Start authentication process with Facebook platform
Authorize access to Facebook Pages, insights, and posting capabilities
Choose which Facebook Pages to connect from available pages
Set specific permissions for each connected Facebook Page
Confirm access to Facebook Page Insights and analytics data
Verify ability to create and schedule posts to connected pages
Finalize Facebook Page integration and activate data syncing

source_documents: /Users/ashutoshbijoor/Documents/Accion Labs/Projects/Cision/Nexus/Brandwatch/brandwatch-docs-viewer/docs/pdfs/Influence/Influence/Using Influence/Managing Influencers/Authenticating Social Accounts in Influence.pdf

tiktok_account_authentication.title: Authenticating TikTok Accounts
tiktok_account_authentication.description: Process for connecting and verifying TikTok accounts for influencer management

steps.details: Navigate to TikTok connection settings in social media section
Begin authentication process with TikTok platform
Authenticate with TikTok credentials for the account to be connected
Authorize Influence platform to access TikTok account data and analytics
Confirm that TikTok account is successfully linked and data is accessible
Set up automatic syncing of TikTok analytics and content data
Verify that TikTok analytics and metrics are properly accessible
Finalize connection and activate TikTok account monitoring

source_documents: /Users/ashutoshbijoor/Documents/Accion Labs/Projects/Cision/Nexus/Brandwatch/brandwatch-docs-viewer/docs/pdfs/Influence/Influence/Using Influence/Managing Influencers/Authenticating Social Accounts in Influence.pdf

youtube_account_authentication.title: Authenticating YouTube Accounts
youtube_account_authentication.description: Process for connecting YouTube channels for content tracking and analytics

steps.details: Navigate to YouTube connection options in social media authentication
Start authentication flow with Google account linked to YouTube channel
Choose the Google account associated with the YouTube channel to connect
Authorize access to YouTube Analytics and channel data
Choose specific YouTube channel from available channels on the account
Set up access to YouTube Analytics and performance metrics
Confirm that YouTube channel data is accessible and syncing properly
Finalize connection and activate YouTube channel monitoring

prerequisites: Google account with channel admin access
source_documents: /Users/ashutoshbijoor/Documents/Accion Labs/Projects/Cision/Nexus/Brandwatch/brandwatch-docs-viewer/docs/pdfs/Influence/Influence/Using Influence/Managing Influencers/Authenticating Social Accounts in Influence.pdf

user_management.title: Adding Users and Managing Permissions
user_management.description: Process for adding new users to the platform and configuring their access permissions

steps.details: Navigate to the administration area and select user management
Select the option to create a new user account
Provide user's name, email address, and contact information
Choose from Company Admin, Group Admin, or Talent Manager roles
Set specific permissions based on selected role and business requirements
Associate user with specific influencer groups or organizational units
Configure any limitations on data access, campaigns, or features
Send user invitation with login credentials and setup instructions
Track whether new user has completed account setup and first login

permission_level_configuration.title: Configuring User Permission Levels
permission_level_configuration.description: Process for setting up and managing different permission levels and access controls

steps.details: Navigate to the permissions and roles management section
Examine current Company Admin, Group Admin, and Talent Manager permission sets
Create custom combinations of permissions for specific business needs
Configure which users can create, edit, or view specific campaigns
Set permissions for influencer profile viewing, editing, and management
Control access to payment processing, financial reporting, and budget information
Set permissions for user management, settings, and system configuration
Verify that permission configurations work as expected for different user types
Assign configured permission levels to existing and new users

group_management.title: Managing Influencer Groups and Talent Managers
group_management.description: Process for creating and managing influencer groups with assigned talent managers

steps.details: Navigate to the influencer groups administration section
Set up a new group with name, description, and organizational purpose
Select a user with Talent Manager role to oversee the group
Select and assign influencers to the newly created group
Set access levels and management permissions for the group

steps.action: Set up revenue sharing if applicable
steps.details: Configure revenue sharing arrangements between group members and managers
Set up group messaging and notification preferences
Set up reporting hierarchy and performance tracking for the group
Enable the group structure and notify relevant stakeholders

talent_manager_assignment.title: Assigning Talent Managers to Influencers
talent_manager_assignment.description: Process for assigning talent managers to oversee specific influencers or groups

steps.details: Navigate to the talent manager configuration section
Choose individual influencers or groups that need talent manager oversight
Select appropriate talent manager based on expertise and capacity
Set specific responsibilities and authority levels for the talent manager
Set up direct communication paths between talent manager and assigned influencers
Establish KPIs and goals for the talent manager-influencer relationship
Set up any commission or revenue sharing arrangements
Inform talent manager and influencers about the new management relationship
Track the success of talent manager assignments and make adjustments as needed

revenue_sharing_configuration.title: Configuring Revenue Sharing Arrangements
revenue_sharing_configuration.description: Process for setting up revenue sharing between influencers, talent managers, and company

steps.details: Navigate to the financial configuration section for revenue sharing
Choose between percentage-based, flat fee, or tiered revenue sharing structures
Configure what percentage or amount influencers receive from campaigns
Set commission rates for talent managers based on their managed influencers' performance
Set the percentage or amount retained by the company for platform costs
Configure additional revenue sharing based on performance milestones
Set when revenue sharing payments are calculated and distributed
Verify that revenue sharing calculations work correctly with sample data
Enable the revenue sharing system and begin tracking for future payments

prerequisites: Talent managers and influencers in place

platform_settings_management.title: Managing Platform Settings
platform_settings_management.description: Process for configuring general platform settings and preferences

steps.details: Navigate to the main settings and configuration section
Set up company information, branding, and account preferences
Configure company-wide policies, default settings, and organizational preferences
Set default campaign settings, approval workflows, and standard terms
Configure email notifications, alerts, and communication settings
Set policies for data storage, archiving, and deletion
Configure security settings, password policies, and access controls
Set up default settings for third-party integrations and API access
Confirm all configuration changes and apply them platform-wide

bitly_integration_setup.title: Connecting Bitly Account for Link Tracking
bitly_integration_setup.description: Process for integrating Bitly for campaign link tracking and analytics

steps.details: Navigate to the integrations section in platform administration
Choose Bitly from the list of available third-party integrations
Input Bitly API access token and account information
Set default domain, link format, and shortening preferences
Configure how campaign links will be automatically shortened and tracked
Create test shortened links to verify integration is working properly
Set up automatic syncing of Bitly click analytics back to campaign reporting
Define how shortened links will be named and organized in Bitly
Enable the integration for use in campaigns and link tracking

shopify_integration_setup.title: Connecting Shopify Account for Sales Tracking
shopify_integration_setup.description: Process for integrating Shopify to track sales performance from influencer campaigns

steps.details: Navigate to the Shopify integration section in platform integrations
Enter Shopify store URL and initiate OAuth connection process
Grant permissions for Influence to access Shopify sales data and customer information
Set up which sales metrics and data points will be tracked from Shopify
Configure automatic syncing of Shopify product information for campaign use
Set up automatic creation and tracking of influencer-specific coupon codes
Configure referral link tracking to attribute sales to specific influencers
Verify that sales data is flowing correctly from Shopify to Influence platform
Set up Shopify sales data to appear in campaign performance reports
Enable the integration for live sales tracking in campaigns

prerequisites: Active Shopify store with admin access
